cta.title: Need a custom laundry workflow?
cta.subtitle: Talk to our team about recurring schedules, service areas, and commercial account setup.

faqs.answer: Most wash and fold orders are returned in 24-48 hours. Rush windows are available in select ZIP codes.
faqs.question: What is your normal turnaround time?

faqs.answer: Yes. We split and process each category independently, then return them together unless you request separate deliveries.
faqs.question: Can I mix wash-and-fold and dry-cleaning in one order?

faqs.answer: Yes. Weekly and biweekly recurring plans are available for household and commercial customers.
faqs.question: Do you support recurring pickup schedules?

faqs.answer: We evaluate weekly volume, textile types, pickup cadence, and turnaround requirements, then provide a tiered quote.
faqs.question: How do commercial quotes work?

hero.title: Clean, Modern Laundromat with Premium Services
hero.subtitle: Self-service, professional wash & fold, and convenient drop-off options.

benefits: Same-day and next-day wash & fold service
Wide folding stations with comfortable seating
Wash & Fold Club with exclusive perks
overview.introduction: WeWash offers a clean, friendly environment for self-service laundry plus professional wash & fold for busy customers who want quality care.

items.title: Self-Service Laundry
benefits: Wide folding stations throughout the store
items.subtitle: Large-capacity machines
items.whatToExpect: Load your laundry card, select your machines, and enjoy our clean facility while you wait or use our folding stations.
items.fullDescription: Our state-of-the-art machines deliver efficient washes and thorough, fast drying. Enjoy spacious folding stations with comfortable seating and a clean, friendly environment.
items.shortDescription: Large-capacity washers and efficient dryers for your laundry needs.

items.title: Same-Day Wash & Fold
items.subtitle: Drop off before noon
items.whatToExpect: Drop off before noon for same-day service. We'll text you when it's ready for pickup.
items.fullDescription: Drop off your laundry in the morning and pick it up the same day. Our team sorts, washes, dries, and carefully folds your clothes with attention to detail.
items.shortDescription: Professional wash, dry, and fold service completed the same day.

items.title: Next-Day Wash & Fold
items.subtitle: Best value for regular customers
items.whatToExpect: Drop off anytime, pick up the next day. Join our Wash & Fold Club for exclusive Speed Drop Off access.
items.fullDescription: Save $0.15/lb with our next-day service. Perfect for customers who can plan ahead and want professional care at a better rate.
items.shortDescription: Economical wash & fold service with next-day pickup.

items.title: Speed Drop Off
benefits: No need to park or come inside
items.subtitle: Club members only
items.whatToExpect: Earn stamps with regular wash & fold service to join the club, then enjoy this convenient pickup option.
items.fullDescription: For Wash & Fold Club members only. No need to come insideâ€”just call us when you arrive and we'll come to your car to collect your laundry.
items.shortDescription: Wash & Fold Club exclusive: stay in your car and call us for curbside pickup.

items.title: Professional Alterations
items.subtitle: Expert tailoring on-site
items.whatToExpect: Bring your garments in for fitting and consultation. We'll provide a quote and completion timeline.
items.fullDescription: Find your perfect fit with our on-site alteration services. From hemming to resizing, our experienced team handles all types of garment modifications.
items.shortDescription: Expert tailoring and alterations for the perfect fit.
